alert.note: Alert for Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Pasco and south central Hernando Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Hernando County Airport, or 9 miles southeast of Spring Hill. These storm were moving slowly westward. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Hernando County Airport, Garden Grove, Masaryktown and Shady Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
